category.name: Active Workspace
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ChangeSummaryTableColumns
preference.preference_description: Defines column names which needs to be displayed in Change Summary Table on summary page of Change Notice Revision. The preference contains three type of values. 1. Type:TYPE_NAME,Property:PROPERTY_NAME,Width:PIXEL_WIDTH : For this entry system will read source property name for the column from PROPERTY_NAME and will get diplay name for the column from owning type TYPE_NAME. Example : Type:WorkspaceObject,Property:object_name,Width:200 2. Type:Key,Property:KEYNAME,Width:PIXEL_WIDTH : For this entry system will search for preference ChangeSummaryTableColumns_KEYNAME to retrieve source property names for the column. For example for ID column source property can be item_id for ItemRevision type and cpd0design_element_id for DesignElement type. Example : Type:Key,Property:ID,Width:250 3. Type:NoType,Property:action,Width:PIXEL_WIDTH : This entry is to display "ACTION" column in Change Summary Table. Example : Type:NoType,Property:action,Width:150
